space.arim.perms.api

Interface Group

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Permissible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupInfo

    public interface Group
extends Permissible
    A permissions group.

    Specifications:
    * getId() must return a unique group ID.
    * #equals(Object object) MUST be overriden AND check for equivalency using #getId()
    * Object.hashCode() should likewise be overriden and implemented based on #getId()
    * hasPermission(String, String) should check whether the group has the permission ONLY for the category provided. It should NOT determine whether the group has permission for the category or the general category.
    Author:
    A248
